class_notes: course will meet synchronously online Mondays from 6-9pm EST
course_description: Explores the role of business in "doing good" for society, how to develop a vision for sustainability within a company, what it means to work on environmental concerns in a major corporation, and compares the approaches of leading companies. Emphasis on readings, writing assignments and discussion.
prerequisites: ENVS 225 or ENVS 227 or POLS 227 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2863, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-9p, Instructor: B. Jordan, Status: Open
